mapper.select: select s.id, to_char(s.applydate,'yyyy-mm-dd') applydate, to_char(s.editdate,'yyyy-mm-dd') editdate, s.appliedcompany, k.keywords from self_introduce s, (select listagg(k.keyword,',') within group(order by sid) as keywords from keyword_selfintroduce k, self_introduce s where sid = s.id and s.userid = #{userId} group by s.id) k
